ingredient-information.sestavine: Aaua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Parfum, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, Hexyl Cynnamal, CI 18050, CI42051.

product-info.opis: Podarite sebi in svoji koži dišeče razvajanje z gelom za prhanje Perfume drops. Naj vas zapelje razkošni vonj orientalskega parfuma.

title: GEL ZA PRHANJE PERFUME DROPS, SUBRINA, 250ML
